<p><span class="author may-blank id-t2_6j6ed">Congrats, <strong>antaymonkey</strong></span> for the child that’s on the way. Even bigger congrats for the decor you made for the room your child will be sleeping in. It’s never too early to get science flowing through the veins </p>
Sweeeeet! That child will be next generation of ksp gamers
I can't see the pictures! But its uhh...Good! *cries for baby and how bad i am*
